app_description.message: This extension hides annoying downloads bar in the bottom of the screen.

opt_show_download_panel.message: Show downloads bar when downloading is active

opt_show_download_panel_desc.message: Hiding the downloads bar occurs only after downloads finished

opt_show_download_panel_warn.message: Correct work with now active downloads is not possible!

opt_show_download_panel_timeout.message: Delay in seconds before hiding the panel after downloading

opt_show_download_panel_timeout_desc.message: Use a time delay for the impact on the downloaded file

opt_show_notification_desc.message: Show notification if file downloading status has changed

opt_sound_notification_desc.message: Disable if your notification system already uses an audio alert

opt_type_icon_info.message: Select the type of indication on the toolbar

opt_type_icon_info_desc.message: Off can significantly reduce the load on the system

opt_color_icon_info_desc.message: Allows you to set the download color in the icon

opt_color_icon_text_info.message: Text color of indication in icon

opt_color_icon_text_info_desc.message: Set the download color for the text in the icon
